pull_request.title: Fix #199452 myflixerz.to
pull_request.body:
Issue: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/199452

Similar to https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/pull/198191 case. There's also propeller ads
